backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report describing implemented PWA-related features, associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend game modules and assets for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point linking the PWA manifest, icons, and loading the React app.
frontend/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Guide explaining how to package the Snake PWA into an Android App Bundle using Bubblewrap and TWA.
frontend/public/.well-known/assetlinks.j: Template asset links file used for Android TWA verification containing placeholder package and certificate.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA metadata, icons, colors, and standalone display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing offline caching, precaching, runtime caching, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering SnakeScreen and registering the service worker.
frontend/src/game/animations.ts: Exports animation timing constants and a wait helper for async delays.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Maps image asset paths and provides a helper to compute candy sprite positions.
frontend/src/game/audio/audioManager.ts: Implements a basic audio manager with mute, play, and sound loading using silent placeholders.
frontend/src/game/audio/sfx.ts: Wrapper functions triggering specific game sound effects via the audio manager.
frontend/src/game/boardGeneration.ts: Generates initial boards without immediate matches and refills empty cells with new candies.
frontend/src/game/boardReshuffle.ts: Reshuffles the board until it has at least one legal move.
frontend/src/game/CandyTile.tsx: UI component rendering a candy tile with sprite selection and special candy visuals.
frontend/src/game/GameBoard.tsx: Renders the game board grid, manages touch/mouse interactions, and triggers swaps and selection.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main React screen composing the match-3 UI, HUD, board, audio mute, restart, and overlays.
frontend/src/game/gravity.ts: Applies gravity to drop candies downward and returns resulting fall movements.
frontend/src/game/interaction.ts: Utility functions for adjacency checks, position validation, and directional neighbor lookup.
frontend/src/game/legalMoves.ts: Scans the board for any swap that would create a match.
frontend/src/game/matchDetection.ts: Finds horizontal and vertical matches and checks whether a swap would produce a match.
frontend/src/game/Overlays.tsx: Defines game-over and level-complete overlay components with icons and action buttons.
frontend/src/game/progression.ts: Provides level configuration and checks if a levelâ€™s target score is met.
frontend/src/game/resolutionPipeline.ts: Resolves matches, applies special candy logic, scoring, and handles special activations.
frontend/src/game/scoring.ts: Defines scoring for clears and computes level target scores and initial moves.
frontend/src/game/specialActivations.ts: Computes cleared targets for special candies and detects special-combo activations.
frontend/src/game/specialCandyRules.ts: Creates special candies from matches and applies them to the board by clearing matched tiles and assigning the special type.
frontend/src/game/touchControls.ts: Detects swipe direction based on touch start and end coordinates with a distance threshold.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines core game types such as candies, matches, game state, and constants like board size and candy types.
frontend/src/game/useMatch3Game.ts: Main hook managing Match-3 gameplay state, handling moves, cascades, scoring, levels, animations, and sounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning no backend queries since the game is fully client-side.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color palette, layout, and UI styling for the game interface.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/snake/DPad.tsx: Renders a directional pad component for controlling snake movement via buttons or touch.
frontend/src/snake/logic.ts: Implements core Snake logic including movement, food generation, collision detection, and speed rules.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeCanvas.tsx: Canvas renderer for the Snake game, drawing the grid, food, and snake with basic visual effects.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeOverlays.tsx: Defines three UI overlay components (GameOver, Pause, Idle) for displaying game state messages and action buttons.
frontend/src/snake/SnakeScreen.tsx: Main Snake game screen wiring game state, keyboard input, HUD, canvas rendering, overlays, and D-pad controls.
frontend/src/snake/types.ts: Contains TypeScript types for directions, positions, game status, and overall SnakeGameState.
frontend/src/snake/useSnakeGame.ts: Custom hook managing Snake game state, game loop, movement, collisions, food handling, and control actions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended theme colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current feature set, issues, and required assets for the Snake game and Android packaging.
